attributes.action: Reinstate the 10% income tax rate which has been removed in the budget
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The chancellor has removed the 10% rate of income tax in his 2007 budget. This impinges severely on people with incomes of less than about £18,000 per annum. It means that poor people will pay more tax and wealthier ones will pay less. Is this fair?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
